sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import CRUD from '../Photos/Crud.png' import AUTH from '../Photos/auth.png' function Home() { return (

Saul's Book System

This project contains two parts:

  • Classic CRUD Demonstration
  • Industrial Standard Registration/Authentication Practice

+

For the CRUD part, user can Create, Read, Update and Delete book info.

It is built on full MERN tech stack, namely, MongoDB, Express, React and Node.JS.


The Registration/Authentication part uses Firebase Authentication, including SignUp, Login with email/password, and Google Auth0 API.

It also allows the user to update their password in the dashboard and reset the password if password has been forgotten.

Also private routes have been setup for dashboard and update profile components. Login is needed for accessing these private routes.

Used tech includes, but not limited to, MERN, axios, react-router-dom, material-ui, react-bootstrap, firebase, google auth0, react-cookies, etc.

) } export default Home
